Name: Caf√© De Blauwe Pan
Review Text: Aaaaaaaaaamazing find in Amsterdam. When you leave the central city and wander a bit, you find amazing places like this. Awesome bar, hospitality is next level, and apple tart that will blow your mind.

Name: Caf√© De Blauwe Pan
Review Text: Very enjoyable afternoon spend here with friends. Great place, good food and drinks and personnel with loads of humour which definitely adds to the place! Will be back!

Name: Caf√© De Blauwe Pan

Review Text: Delicious nachos but the creme de la creme would definitely be their pies and cakes. Delicious home baked and often mass ordered (because they are simply THAT good). Service is not always fast.

Name: Caf√© De Blauwe Pan
